statements: DELETE FROM livestock_sales WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM livestock_sales WHERE transaction_id = 1001 AND customer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM livestock_sales WHERE unit_price > 50 OR quantity < 10;
DELETE FROM FinancialRecords WHERE transaction_type = 'Expense' AND amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM Purchases WHERE purchase_price > 500.00 AND purchase_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Sales WHERE sale_price < 1000.00 AND sale_date >= '2022-03-01'
DELETE FROM Purchases WHERE total_price > 5000 AND purchase_date < '2023-01-01';
